issue.title: [CF 594] Vampiric Touch pop up before fall off?
issue.body:
^1^T^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SUnit^Starget ^SType^Sbuff ^SAlpha^N0.23 ^SName^S34914 ^SShowWhen^N1 ^SUnAlpha^N0.6 ^SEnabled^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SBUFFDUR ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S<= ^SUnit^Starget ^SName^S34914 ^SLevel^N2 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SOnlyMine^B ^t^N60206^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Hi there. Just started useing the addon and love it.

Sorry to bug you, I'm sure this is just user error. I am trying to get my Vampiric Touch icon to pop up whenever my target does not have the debuff and then pop up again 2 seconds before it falls off so I can start the cast before it actually falls off.

I have tried a few different ways of configuring the icon including this one useing a debuff condition, but all I can get it to do is pop up after the debuff has completely fallen off.


> Posted by CurseForge user FerrisThe2nd | Imported from CurseForge issue #594 | Raw

comments.body:
Its not showing when it has between 0 and 2 second remaining because you have it set to hide when the debuff is present.

Revised export string:

^1^T^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SUnit^Starget ^SType^Sbuff ^SUnAlpha^N0.6 ^SAlpha^N0.6 ^SName^S34914 ^SDurationMaxEnabled^B ^SShowWhen^N3 ^SOnlyMine^B ^SEnabled^B ^SDurationMax^N2 ^t^N60317^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Edited Sep 6, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

That's fantastic.

I misunderstood what the Duration Requirements were.

Thank you so much!
